item.title: Vystar Corp 10-K
item.description: Vystar Corp, which is in the Fabricated Rubber Products, Nec [3060] industry, SEC 10-K filing on May 17, 2022 had 21423 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 349 instances 2021 - 240 instances december - 211 instances stock - 206 instances 31 - 206 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
